backend_llm_notes: Claude Sonnet 4.5 via Cursor Agent Mode - Advanced reasoning and instruction following
original_prompt: Review the materials for my meeting with senior leadership and suggest the best way to summarize the topics into three main discussion points. Generate any objections or concerns that might come up and give me effective responses.

gutts.name: Meeting Materials Retrieval
gutts.capability: Access and load all relevant documents, presentations, and data for the meeting
gutts.user_goal: System has all materials to analyze comprehensively
gutts.evidence: Retrieved meeting materials (presentations, reports, data files)

gutts.name: Content Analysis & Topic Extraction
gutts.capability: Identify main themes and topics across all materials
gutts.user_goal: Understand what the materials cover at high level
gutts.evidence: Extracted key themes from materials using NLP analysis

gutts.name: Executive Summary Distillation
gutts.capability: Condense complex topics into 3 concise, high-impact discussion points
gutts.user_goal: Clear, high-level discussion framework for leadership
gutts.evidence: Generated 3 discussion points: 1) Strategy alignment, 2) Resource needs, 3) Risk mitigation

gutts.name: Audience-Aware Framing
gutts.capability: Frame discussion points appropriately for senior leadership audience (strategic, high-level, business impact)
gutts.user_goal: Points resonate with executive priorities and concerns
gutts.evidence: Framed points with business impact, strategic implications, resource considerations

gutts.name: Objection Anticipation
gutts.capability: Predict concerns, pushback, or tough questions from senior leaders
gutts.user_goal: Prepared for tough questions and challenges
gutts.evidence: Anticipated objections: budget concerns, timeline feasibility, ROI questions

gutts.name: Response Preparation
gutts.capability: Generate effective, well-reasoned responses to anticipated objections
gutts.user_goal: Confident, well-reasoned responses ready for each concern
gutts.evidence: Prepared responses with supporting data, analogies, mitigation strategies

gutts.name: Briefing Document Generation
gutts.capability: Format summary, objections, and responses into comprehensive prep document
gutts.user_goal: Comprehensive prep materials ready to review before meeting
gutts.evidence: Generated briefing doc: 3 discussion points, anticipated objections, prepared responses

notes: Generated by Claude Sonnet 4.5 - Matches reference decomposition of 7 GUTTs
